Healthy eating habits can reduce childho: Can healthy eating habits reduce childhood obesity risk? Impact of healthy eating on childhood obesity

Adopting healthy eating patterns as a family helps children reach and maintain a healthy weight as they age. Eating a variety of vegetables and fruits, whole grains, lean protein foods, and low-fat and fat-free dairy products follows nutrition guidelines and sets children and adults up for optimal health.
Can healthy eating habits reduce childhood obesity risk? Impact of healthy eating on childhood obesity
Establishing healthy eating habits and lifestyles in early childhood may help children gain appropriate weight and further improve their health outcomes later in life.
